column4:
All that is necessary for the triumph of evil is that good men do nothing. We all have heard this before. I recall a German regime singling out a minority. The world should have spoken louder then. We don't need to repeat those same mistakes.

\r\n

I request Stephen Harper represent Canada's values of inclusiveness and peace by publicly condemning this frightening situation in Russia. Canada can,Prime Minister of Canada"
column8:
I am sad to learn that Russia's President Putin has enabled legalized intolerance and persecution of homosexuals. 

We have seen this before in Germany many years ago but not out of our minds. A country singles out scapegoats and then clamps down on them. The nations of the world then failed millions of people by waiting too long to speak up. 

Please join us in expressing our Canadian values that intolerance is unacceptable,34,//d22r54gnmuhwmk.cloudfront.net/photos/3/bi/ta/vsBITacfwGLJLIz-556x313-cropped.jpg"
